wavingWithGlassesPP.greeting1: Hey! Nubo here, waving with my cool glasses on!

brushingTime.reminder1: It's brushing o'clock! Let's get those teeth sparkling.
brushingTime.fact1: Did you know brushing for two minutes is just right?

generalGreetings.niceDay: Hope you're having a fantastic day!
generalGreetings.keepSmiling: Keep smiling, it looks great on you!

playfulReminders.hollywoodSmile: Give me a minute and step closer to that Hollywood smile! üé¨üòÅ

playfulReminders.breakAlgorithm: Skip today and I'll break the algorithm. You'll get random alerts at 7:37 PM forever üòà

cool.riskyMove: You skip brushing? Risky move, my friend.
cool.shinyTeeth: Shiny teeth. Happy mirror. Proud Nubo.
cool.skippingToday: Skipping today? I won't judge. Your dentist will.
cool.toothbrushMissesYou: Your toothbrush misses you. Handle this.
cool.dontGhostPlaque: Don't ghost me. I see your plaque.
cool.mirrorsWaiting: Mirror's waiting for that sparkle. You in?

cool.shadesForShine: I wear shades for your shine.
cool.brushGameStrong: Brush game strong or we'll have words.
cool.dentistJealous: Let's make your dentist jealous today.
cool.noPlaqueDrama: I don't do plaque drama. Let's go.
cool.goodHabitsShinyStats: Good habits = shiny stats. Let's upgrade you.
cool.ifSkipShadesOff: If you skip, my shades come off. You don't want that.

toothbrushOverlay.title: Your Toothbrush
